metadata.title: CVE-2021-21644 jenkins-2-plugins/config-file-provider: does not require POST requests for an HTTP endpoint, resulting in a cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability. (moderate)
metadata.description: DOCUMENTATION: A cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability was found in the config-file-provider Jenkins plugin. The plugin does not require POST requests for an HTTP endpoint which allows attackers to delete configuration files corresponding to an attacker-specified ID.

criterions.comment: Red Hat Enterprise Linux 9 is installed
jenkins-2-plugins is signed with Red Hat redhatrelease2 key
Red Hat Enterprise Linux must be installed
